AuthSchemas.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
AuthSchemas.passwordLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
AuthSchemas.passwordUpprecase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
AuthSchemas.passwordNumber: Password must contain at least one number
AuthSchemas.passwordSpecialChar: Password must contain at least one special character
